extendedInfo.description: *updated October 18*We understand that Galaxy S3 users are being asked to update everyday even though there is no actual update. We are working to resolve this issue with Bell Mobility. We do believe we have figured out how you can stop being prompted for updates through the following steps:1)Click Settings > Applications Manager > All (tab)2)	Find and click on Sympatico.ca 3)	Click Disable (You may be prompted by a warning message saying âDisabling built in apps, may cause errors in other appsâ). 4)	Click ok. Again, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you. ----------------Get quick and easy access to your favourite content from Sympatico.ca. From fashion to autos, celebrity gossip and financial news, weâve got you covered on a range of topics from a uniquely Canadian perspective.Lookup winning lottery numbers. Get the scoop on todayâs events and the current weather based on your location. Youâll also find stories from Sympatico.ca favourites such as Celebedge, Dramarama, Fashionism, Push, Sync, inMusic and more. Best of all, as we get more of our Sympatico.ca content available for mobile, youâll be able to access it automatically from the app. The Sympatico.ca app is FREE and it customizes itself based on your user profile and location; making sure that you get only the most relevant content right at your fingertips. The app also comes with a QR code (2D Barcode) reader to help you scan those strange bar codes you have been seeing in magazines, stores and posters. App Featuresâ¢	Location-based weather â¢	Breaking news alertsâ¢	Customizable contentâ¢	Social Sharing (SMS, Email, Twitter & Facebook) â¢	Bilingual language support (English & French) â¢	QR code reader (2D barcode)Download the Sympatco.ca mobile app now. Where Canadians start there day!

reviews.title: Not particularly useful
reviews.comment: This came bundled with my Bell phone. It adds no value in that the content it provides is not interesting or relevant. What\'s more, it updates frequently with no apparent improvement in functionality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Utter crap!!
reviews.comment: This is the third update notification in 24 hours. This app is useless garbage with no information of note inside it. It appears to update itself either every new news item.  I\'m tired of its update spam send I want it off my device. Bell are you listening?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To slow and irrelevant...to Canadians and others
reviews.comment: Opened up when sweeping out my \"apps closet\" tried it. No big deal, better  to use CBC,  CNN  or BBC news apps  or yahoo sites.
reviews.author: William Guest

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: Annoying useless app that I can\'t delete and asks for updates every second day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I take this off my phone?? It\'s just here taking up space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suck
reviews.comment: Dear bell,  Plz get this app off my beautiful sg3....I don\'t like it nor need it. I wish you would not force us to have this app...               Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stop updating this. No one uses it.
reviews.comment: This senseless. I don\'t need it I never use it. It\'s hid on my Galaxy SIII and it\'s trash. Stop updating it every two days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bloatware from Bell
reviews.comment: I wish there were a way to uninstall this from my Virgin Mobile phone.
reviews.author: Holger Reusch

reviews.title: Junk!!!
reviews.comment: Bloatware sucks.  \'Nuff said.  Anyone who rates more then 1 star must work for Bell.  How sad!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Useless bloatware that adds no functionality to my phone. Updates frequently with no added performance or content improvement. Would remove if I could, but this was added by my carrier.
reviews.author: Benjamin VanMeggelen

reviews.title: Why Bell, why?
reviews.comment: This app is completely useless. Plus, the nearly daily updates (that dont seem to add or fix anything) are super annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying App
reviews.comment: Best bet is to kill notifications for this app and hide the icon in a deep dark hole, then at least the constant updates won\'t be annoying. To be honest I have never used this app it\'s bloatware forced on the phone by Bell.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: STOP UPDATING!!!!!
reviews.comment: This app keeps requesting an update EVERY TIME I TURN MY PHONE OFF!!! Its been doing this for almost a month now. Please fix this screw as its very irritating and I don\'t use the app anyways
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible!!!
reviews.comment: Why force people to keep an application against their will? Makes no sense marketing wise, only generates negative feelings toward Bell! #fail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: This is a total waste of space, but you cant get rid of it. It updates every day, sometimes more than once.  Bell: stop bundling this crap.
reviews.author: Gregory Vaughan

reviews.title: Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Please allow uninstall and I\'ll rate it higher as it will then give me useful options.
reviews.author: Glen Cyr

reviews.title: This app is garbage
reviews.comment: It came on my device and I have no way of getting it off and I never use this app, its useless!
reviews.author: Connor Jenkins

reviews.title: I remember sympatico..
reviews.comment: The year was 1998. I had just purchased a sleek new 486 desktop computer and couldn\'t wait to hook it up to my ultra fast 28.8 kbs modem.. Long story short, I\'ll be rooting my phone just so I can delete this useless abortion of an app.
reviews.author: Sean Hemeon

reviews.title: Just want it gone
reviews.comment: Tired of the up dates and spam ... just want it off my phone.  Its a shame tho if it was all done properly you could have the potential for a great app Disappointed :(
reviews.author: samantha verbree

reviews.title: Updates daily
reviews.comment: I hate this app it wants to update daily even though the last update was in June. Please fix. Or remove from my phone. I didn\'t buy it, so I don\'t want it.
reviews.author: A Google User
